title: False Friends
description: Words that look similar across languages but mean different things

questions.question: In French, 'actuellement' does NOT mean 'actually.' What does it mean?
The German word 'Gift' does not mean a present. What does it mean?
In Italian, 'camera' does not refer to a photography device. What does it mean?
The Spanish word 'embarazada' does NOT mean embarrassed. What does it mean?
In French, 'libraire' does not mean library. What does it mean?
The German word 'Rat' does not refer to a rodent. What does it mean?
In Portuguese, 'puxe' (on a door) does not mean push. What does it mean?
The French word 'bras' does not refer to undergarments. What does it mean?
In Spanish, 'constipado' does NOT mean constipated. What does it mean?
The Italian word 'firma' does not mean a business firm. What does it mean?
In French, 'assister' does NOT mean to assist. What does it mean?
The German word 'Handy' does not mean handy or convenient. What does it mean?
